title: Swiss Posters
content:
FYI. They do it better than anyone I know.   
 [http://swissposters.library.cmu.edu/Swiss/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013041532/http:/swissposters.library.cmu.edu/Swiss/)
author: giam

comments.content: Wonderful overview tho "large images" could be larger and clearer. Still the first category's a real bisquit!
Nice link. Also a great place to steal ideas. I mean get inspired. Oops.
Nice to see that my alma mater had a hand in it
